questions.title: Have you had any of the following symptoms since your last visit (or in the past week, if this is your first visit)?

On DATE OF LAST VISIT you reported that you were still ill with symptoms that began on DATE OF FIRST SYMPTOMS REPORTED PREVIOUSLY. Are the symptoms you reported today part of the same bout of illness?
In the 14 days before your symptoms started, did you travel to an area at risk for new coronavirus infection?
In which area(s) at risk of infection did you go within 14 days before the onset of your symptoms?
In the 14 days before the onset of your symptoms, have you been in contact with one or more people who have stayed in an area at risk of infection with the new coronavirus?
In which area(s) at risk of infection with the new coronavirus these people have been?
In the 14 days before your symptoms started, have you been in close contact with someone for whom a PCR test (nasal swab) has confirmed that they have Covid-19?
Do you live in the same household as that person?
In the 14 days before your symptoms started, have you been in close contact with someone presenting symptoms of COVID-19?
Do you live in the same household as that person?
When did the first symptoms appear?
When did your symptoms end?
Did your symptoms develop suddenly over a few hours?
When did your fever begin?
Did your fever develop suddenly over a few hours?
Did you take your temperature?
What was your highest temperature measured?
Because of your symptoms, did you VISIT (see face to face) any of medical services?

option_4.text: Hospital accident & emergency department/out of hours service

option_6.text: No, but I have an appointment scheduled

questions.title: How soon after your symptoms appeared did you first visit this medical service?
Because of your symptoms, did you contact via TELEPHONE or INTERNET any of medical services?

option_3.text: GP - spoke to the doctor or nurse

questions.title: How soon after your symptoms appeared did you first contact via telephone or internet this medical service?
What is the main reason for which you did not contact any health professional for the symptoms you declared today?

option_4.text: I think I know what I have and I use self-medication

option_5.text: I think there is no effective treatment for the disease I have

option_6.text: It is too hard to get an appointment quickly

option_9.text: For fear of consequences if the doctor thinks I have COVID-19

option_11.text: I don’t know/don’t want to answer

questions.title: Can you specify which consequences you mainly fear?

option_1.text: Have to do a diagnostic test

questions.title: Because of your symptoms, did you call [write the COVID-19 emergency line of your country]?
Because of your symptoms, did you call [EMERGENCY NUMBER FOR YOUR COUNTRY]?
Because of your symptoms, did you wear a mask (surgical mask sold in pharmacies)?

option_2.text: No, I would have liked but could not find any

questions.title: Because of your symptoms, did you undergo analyses to know if you have COVID-19 (infection due to SRAS-CoV-2)?

option_1.text: Yes, a PCR test (virus search, on a swab in nose or mouth, or a sputum or saliva sample)

option_2.text: Yes, a serological analysis (screening for antibodies against this virus, from a drop of blood at fingertip or a blood sample)

option_3.text: Not yet, I plan to shortly undergo a test

option_4.text: No, I have a prescription but will not undergo a test

option_5.text: Yes, a rapid antigen detection test (on a swab in nose or mouth, with a result available in less than an hour)

questions.comment: (the participant can select the first and second option together if he wants)

questions.title: Do you already get the result of this PCR test?

option_1.text: Yes, Positive for this new coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2, COVID-19)

option_2.text: Yes, Negative for this new coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2, COVID-19)

option_3.text: Yes, the result is non interpretable

option_4.text: No, I do not have the result yet

questions.title: Do you already get the result of this serological analysis?

option_1.text: Yes, Positive for this new coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2, COVID-19)

option_2.text: Yes, Negative for this new coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2, COVID-19)

option_3.text: Yes, the result is non interpretable

option_4.text: No, I do not have the result yet

questions.title: How much time passed between the beginning of your symptoms and your search of a laboratory which could undergo this analysis?

option_1.text: Symptoms appeared the day or the day before the search of a laboratory

option_2.text: Symptoms appeared 2, 3 or 4 days before the search of a laboratory

option_3.text: Symptoms appeared 5, 6 or 7 days before the search of a laboratory

option_4.text: Symptoms appeared between 8 and 14 days before the search of a laboratory

option_5.text: Symptoms appeared between 15 and 28 days before the search of a laboratory

option_6.text: Symptoms appeared more than four weeks before the search of a laboratory

option_7.text: I don’t know/don’t want to answer

questions.title: How much time passed between the beginning of your symptoms and the sampling?
Because of your symptoms, did you undergo analyses to know if you have flu?

option_1.text: Yes, a PCR test (virus search, on a nasal swab)

option_2.text: Not yet, I have a prescription and plan to shortly undergo a test

option_3.text: No, I have a prescription but will not undergo the test

questions.title: Do you already get the result of this PCR test?

option_3.text: Yes, the result is non interpretable

option_4.text: No, I do not have the result yet

questions.title: Did you take medication for these symptoms?

option_2.text: Pain killers (e.g. paracetamol, lemsip, ibuprofen, aspirin, calpol, etc)

questions.title: How much time passed between the beginning of your symptoms did you start taking this medication?
Because of your symptoms, were you hospitalized?
Did you change your daily routine because of your illness?

option_2.text: Yes, but I did not take time off school or work

option_3.text: Yes, I took time off school or work

questions.title: Are you still off work/school?

option_3.text: Other (e.g. I wouldn’t usually be at work/school today anyway

questions.title: How long have you been off work/school?
Because of your symptoms, have you taken or strengthened one or more of the following measures?

option_2.text: Cough or sneeze into your elbow

option_6.text: Stop greeting by hugging and/or kissing on both cheeks

option_7.text: Limit your use of public transport

option_8.text: Avoid gatherings (going to the theater, cinema, stadium, supermarket, etc.)

option_10.text: Telework or increase your number of telework days

option_11.text: Avoid travel outside your own country or region

option_12.comment: Have your food/shopping delivered by a store or a friend/family member

option_14.text: Avoid being in contact with people over 65 years old or with a chronic disease

option_15.text: Avoid being in contact with children

option_16.comment: (exclusive, if this answer is selected, no other answer can be selected)

questions.title: What do you think is causing your symptoms?
For which reason(s) do you think you have this disease? (select all the relevant answers)

option_1.text: My doctor told me I have this disease

option_2.text: I had a laboratory confirmation that I have this disease

option_3.text: I had direct contact with a laboratory confirmed case

option_4.text: I had close contact with someone for whom a doctor diagnosed this disease

option_5.text: I was in close contact with someone presenting symptoms of this disease

option_6.text: I was at an event/location with a confirmed case

option_7.text: I think I have this disease

questions.title: Have you informed people who have been in close contact with you about your suspicion of COVID-19 infection?
Since the beginning of COVID-19 lockdown measures, do you carry out a professional activity? (Select all the relevant answers)?

option_3.text: no, I have a leave of absence to take care of my kid(s)

option_4.text: no, I have a sick leave (because of COVID-19)

option_5.text: No, I have another situation (retired, job-seeker, student, house-wife/husband, other sick-leave, partial unemployment, forced leave…)

questions.title: How many days a week do you work outside from home?
Over recent days, at which frequency did you go out of home to buy products, on average?

option_1.text: I do not go out of home anymore

questions.title: Over recent days, at which frequency did you go out of home to get fresh air or exercise (outside your home, balcony, garden, private courtyard), on average?

option_1.text: I do not go out of home anymore

questions.title: Over the course of yesterday, how many people (outside your household) did you approach at a distance lower than 1 meter?
If lockdown measures were lifted up, but collective childcare/schools/university were closed, what would be your situation? (Select all the relevant answers)

option_2.text: I would work from outside home

option_3.text: I would have a leave of absence to take care of my kid(s)

option_4.text: I would have a sick leave (because of COVID-19)

option_5.text: I would be in another situation (retired, job-seeker, student, house-wife/husband, other sick-leave, partial unemployment, forced leave…)

questions.title: How many days a week would you work outside from home?
If lockdown measures were extended (that is to say, continued beyond the date announced by the government), do you think you would follow the recommendations with as much rigour as you do now?
Since January 2020, did you undergo a laboratory test to know if you have been in contact with this new coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2, COVID-19)?
What was the result of this (these) analysis? (if you realized several analyses, please give the results of all these analyses)

option_1.text: Positive for this coronavirus, on a swab in nose or mouth, or a sputum or saliva sample (PCR)

option_2.text: Negative for this coronavirus, on a swab in nose or mouth, or a sputum or saliva sample (PCR)

option_3.text: Positive for this coronavirus on a blood sample (serology)

option_4.text: Negative for this coronavirus on a blood sample (serology)

option_5.text: Positive, but I don’t know which test was done (it showed that I was infected by the coronavirus)

option_6.text: Negative, but I don’t know which test was done (it showed that I was not infected by the coronavirus)

questions.title: Do you know the result of this rapid antigen detection test?

option_3.text: Yes, the result is non interpretable

option_4.text: No, I don’t know or don’t remember

questions.title: Who realized this rapid antigen detection test?

option_2.text: A specialized physician, a dental surgeon or a mid-wife

option_3.text: A pharmacist or a pharmacy technician

option_4.text: Another health professional (give the list of all health professional authorized to realize this test in your country) (specify)

option_5.text: Another professional (give the list of all other professionals authorized to realize this test)(specify)

option_6.text: I don’t know or don’t remember
